summary: High Res Scaled Armour still is a WIP
descriptionHtml:
[color=Red][size=2]WezEllison\'s[/size] [/color][color=Green][size=2]High Res[/size][/color] [color=Red][size=2]Scaled Armour[/size][/color]

[color=Cyan][size=2]Modders make these to make the game more enjoyable for you, All I ask for is some amount of feedback and if you like what you see please Endorse to show your appreciation, thankyou.[/size][/color]


[color=Green][size=3]Why have you done this?[/size][/color]
I wanted to make my own type of scaled armour, wasn\'t based on anything other than the ideas that came to my head at the time. This is still a WIP \'cause I\'m still not happy with it & it\'s still not up to the level I wanted it to be at, so expect updates. 

I\'m releasing the female version \"as is\" for now, It\'s not way near finished & I haven\'t had time to finish it as of late, so I\'m releasing it to keep you on your toes that bit longer.


Male version - WIP
Female version - WIP
Resolutions come in 1024x1024 & 2048x2048
New Normal Maps 

[color=Green][size=3]Optional Downloads[/size][/color]
I\'ve added a version without the studs for the people who dislike them (I like it a bit better)
You must still download the main file - the download the optional, the reason why I\'ve done it like this is because I didn\'t want people having to download the whole files again when only two things have changed within the file.

Overwrite with the optional download if you want the studless version.

[color=Yellow][size=3]Notice: To future downloaders[/size][/color]
After 1.1 release, I shall include everything in one download.


[color=Green][size=2]INSTALLATION[/size][/color]
Extract contents into your Skyrim directory, click yes to overwrite.


[color=Red][size=2]INCOMPATABILITIES[/size][/color]
Any other file that modifies the textures I do.
author: WezEllison
